BankingContent1:
Our Banking and Financial Services recruitment business has expanded considerably as our firm continues to play a crucial role in our major clients’ recruitment. The arising needs for the investors in the market to seek a higher return across their assets have proven the market growth as well as our business expansion.

Our Banking and Financial Services team break down into the below specialisms :
BankingList1:
• Private Equity
  • Venture Capital
  • Fund of Funds
  • Alternatives
  • Retail Banking
  • Corporate Banking
  • Private Wealth Management
  • Investment Banking
BankingList2:
• Global Capital Markets
  • Leveraged Finance
  • Structured Finance
  • Operations ( General Ops, Trade, Treasury, Settlement )
  • Product Control ( Wholesale Banking, Global Markets, Consumer Banking )
  • Risk & Compliance
  • Internal Audit
  • Investor Relations
TMTContent1:
To cope with the fierce competition, constant innovation, volatile industrial landscapes, and increased customer expectation, we continually enhance our Consultants’ skills in the industry to help our clients search for the most suitable candidate and help our candidates to land on their dream job to develop their career. Our clients range from multinational corporates to market leaders and many visionary start-ups so as their investors.

OCG has significant experience within the practice including :
TechList1:
• Front End Developers
  • Back End Developers
  • Mobile Developers
  • UX/UI Designers
  • Data Analysts
  • Internet of Things ( IoT )
  • Artificial Intelligence
  • AR / VR
  • Blockchain
  • Banking IT
MediaList1:
• Marketing
  • Public Relations & Event Planners
  • Advertising
  • Entertainment
